fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Slam: When in a duel, all cards you play count as double points. You may elect to not have this active.
- Bolster: When in a duel, automatically draw 2 cards.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pummel: Pick a player. Deal them 2 HP unblockable damage at the end of the phase. [2 use, 4 CD, Night]
- Roar: Draw 2 random attacking cards. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Intimidate: Gain a Trap?! [1 use, Unique]
